      • op

        public JsonPatch.Builder op(JsonPatchOp op)
        This allows for better forward compatibility. If orchestrate introduces a new Patch Op, older versions of the Java client will be able to use it via this method.
        Parameters:
        op - The patch operation to add.
        Returns:
        this builder.
